item.title: Hacking WordPress shortened links and Twitter Tools
item.description: This shortened URL business really has gotten out of hand.  Morning Toast wrote a rant about it a few days ago and it got me thinking about their usefulness.  He also twittered about Flickr's own URL shortener as well.  Although Flickr uses a different domain name for these shortened URLs, the link is still obvious about it's context; it is a Flickr image.
